title: Jungle Shyvana + Sated?
body:
Okay, I literally woke up at 2am with this realisation: how broken Shyv would be with her Sated devourer. Her kit has so many on-hit effects it isn't funny. Her ult passive proc will allow a longer dragon and lower "CD", her W passive will proc twice, her E mark will proc twice, and her Q after an AA will proc Sated again after resetting the AA.

Now, if you build her with on-hit items, like BoRK, Black Cleaver, Wits End, and Frozen Mallet, on paper it looks OP. 

So here is my question; how broken is Shyvana with Sated Devourer?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=I4sW6v8o,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-28T01:47:44.010+0000)
>
> So here is my question; how broken is Shyvana with Sated Devourer?

Watch the last TSM vs C9 game to see Shyvana wreck.
people done this. its bs she doesn't get hurt and she like 2 hits you
I knew it wasn't original, but really the only League I've had is watching the OPL.

Shes been one of the most popular junglers since the item came out (and the only devourer jungler ive noticed in lcs), so yes, it's good. Usually building devourer + BotRK with the rest tank items is the best mix of damage and survivability.

I thought so. I haven't played League in a month but I have kept up-to-date with the updates just in case League ever wants to work for me again so I haven't actually seen any real gameplay besides OPL VODs

As for the build, I sort of expected it, but I was also thinking how much she could abuse the on-hit effects.
